name: The Legendary Adventure of Buck Quickshot!
name_original: The Legendary Adventure of Buck Quickshot!
description:
The Legendary Adventure of Buck Quickshot is an epic adventure for Game Boy of Legendary proportions. You play as the hero in a quest to save a town in the American Wild West. Featuring impressive 1-bit(ish) graphics! Gun slingers! Bank Robbers! Shootouts! It's got some of those, and MORE!

This is an adventure parody game was made using GB Studio for the Game Boy Competition 2021. 

Controls:

ActionGame BoyKeyboardMoveD-PadArrow KeysInteract/TalkAZShoot in Top-Down ViewBXShoot in Platform viewAZJump in Platform ViewBAView MenuStartEnterUse DynamiteSelectShit

All development of assets and programming took place during the time of the competition. I edited some stock photos to work with the Game Boy I got from Picsart, and an image from 1966's The Good The Bad and The Ugly. I'm claiming fair use/parody law on that one. But I don't think anyone really cares. This is just for fun.  

Splash Screen by jaredchansen,  (I think only a sign post) from GB Studio stock assets/ Chris Maltby. All other art and music were created by me. 

Tools I used: GBSTUDIO, Pixel Studio, Tiled, and Milky Tracker.

Thanks to Robert Doman for his tutorials!

https://youtube.com/channel/UCU_4orRy-j0qTenIZ5BYL4w

I hope you enjoy the game! I will definitely work to expand and improve the game in the future. Thanks!
